title: Intermediate Ballroom Dance
description: Continuation of DANCÂ 134. Selected ballroom dances: cha cha, foxtrot, merengue, rumba, swing, tango, hustle, paso doble, polka and samba. Emphasis on variations, styles, and performance skill. Purchase of concert ticket(s) may be required. Total credit limited to 6 units. 2 activities.
prerequisites: DANC 134 or intermediate level experience as determined by instructor at first class meeting
